translations: 猛烈的；严厉的；冲劲十足的；巨大的
猛砍；鞭打；（衣服上的）开衩，切口
（用利器）砍，劈；大幅度削减，大大降低（slash 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: He paints with harsh, slashing brushstrokes.
She tried to kill herself by slashing her wrists.
He came within two minutes of bleeding to death after slashing his wrists.
sentences.translation: 他割腕后不到两分钟就失血而死。
